name: Distance of thousand pieces of paper
description:
Analog works from two sides of one piece of paper combined into a digital arrangement with further digital work performed. The forms on each side arise through bleed-through of different analog media, and then finer work is performed in multiple iterations on each side. While they resemble each other and share essntial qualities of color and form, each side follows own trajectory. 

What is a distance of a single piece of paper? A millimeter? A bullet that missed? A letter that was or was not written? A masterpiece? A testament? A story? An agreement? A constitution? An apology? Or just a sketch? A distance of one piece of paper can measure thousands of papers. That distance can be almost infinite.
